# Quick Links to Modules

[School](https://dle.plymouth.ac.uk/course/view.php?id=66067) - [Programme](https://dle.plymouth.ac.uk/course/view.php?id=38727) - [Gradbook](https://gradbook.plymouth.ac.uk/) - [RoomBooking](https://resourcebooker.plymouth.ac.uk/) - [Timetable](https://timetables.plymouth.ac.uk/) - [Panopto](https://plymouth.cloud.panopto.eu/) - [SONA](https://uopsop.sona-systems.com/)

This section provides direct links to the 2024-25 DLE sites and S4 pages for all programmes and modules. It is organised by Programme, so also provides an overview of all teaching.

The [2023-24](https://discourse.psy.plymouth.ac.uk/t/quick-access-to-dle-and-s4-pages/1365), [2022-23](https://liveplymouthac.sharepoint.com/sites/u70/SitePages/DLE%20Quick%20Access%202022-23.aspx), [2021-22](https://liveplymouthac.sharepoint.com/sites/u70/SitePages/DLE%20Quick%20Access%202021-22.aspx) and [2020-21](https://liveplymouthac.sharepoint.com/sites/u70/SitePages/Psychology%20DLE%20sites%202020-21.aspx) sessions are still online. For earlier years, use the [DLE Site Home](https://dle.plymouth.ac.uk/?redirect=0) Search box - type module code and year e.g., 'PSYC204 18'
